name: SUDNO (Судно)
description:
SUDNO is a short, adventure game made by FIVTY,  set in a pseudo historical World War 1. Drawing inspiration from tons of Indie and AAA games like: INSIDE, Escape From Tarkov, Metro: Exodus, and so on. Story driven, and adventure focused, if you're looking for a fleshed out story, and a world filled with mischief and mystery, this is the game for you.

Key features: 

  • Wide open world to explore
  • Simple, yet affective Enemy AI
  • Multiple point of interest's rich with lore
  • Beautiful, simplistic graphics resonating with a rich atmosphere

Other facts:

  • SUDNO is made with Unity, by FIVTY
  • Story was developed over the course of 3 years
  • FIVTY has over 7 years of Indie game experience
  • For us, the player is always first
